description: This nutritionally approved mac and cheese recipe will be a hit with the kids. This easy snack features a cheesy pumpkin sauce and it's ready in just 15 minutes.
keywords: Mac & cheese,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Healthier Easier,Pumpkin,Low sugar,Sesame free,Halal,High protein,Soy free,Vegetarian,Spinach,Peanut free
name: Pumpkin Mac and Cheese Recipe | Woolworths
recipeCategory: Kids light meal & snack,Kids lunch & dinner

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a medium saucepan of water to the boil over high heat. Add pumpkin and cook for 10 minutes or until very soft. Drain.
Meanwhile, cook macaroni according to packet instructions.

Place pumpkin, milk and cheese in a food processor. Blend for 30 seconds or until smooth and combined. Season with pepper. Transfer to a large bowl. Add macaroni and stir to combine. Serve mac and cheese topped with spinach and parsley.
